mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `list` (name, sex, department, email, birthday, telephone, skill, educational, address, del_flag) values(#{name}, #{sex}, #{department}, #{email}, #{birthday}, #{telephone}, #{skill}, #{educational}, #{address}, 0);
mapper.update: update `list` set sex = #{sex},department = #{department},email = #{email},birthday = #{birthday},telephone = #{telephone},skill = #{skill}, educational = #{educational},address = #{address} where name = #{name};
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM list
and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and email like concat('%', #{email}, '%')
and telephone like concat('%', #{telephone}, '%')
LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize}
